TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SessionIDManager extends System.Object implements class System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDManager

summary.span: 管理 ASP.NET 会话状态的唯一标识符。

span.span: Manages unique identifiers for ASP.NET session state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个 HTTP 模块，它管理用于 ASP.NET 会话状态的唯一会话标识符。The class is an HTTP module that manages unique session identifiers for use with ASP.NET session state. ASP.NET 会话的唯一标识符是 属性，该属性可从 当前或的属性访问 。The unique identifier for an ASP.NET session is the property, which can be accessed from the property of the current or . ASP.NET 会话标识符是随机生成的数字，编码为24个字符的字符串，由从 a 到 z 的小写字符和从0到5的数字组成。The ASP.NET session identifier is a randomly generated number encoded into a 24-character string consisting of lowercase characters from a to z and numbers from 0 to 5. 默认情况下，此 值随每个请求发送到 ASP.NET 应用程序。By default, the value is sent in a cookie with each request to the ASP.NET application. 包含该值的 cookie 的名称 为 .asp。默认情况下 NET_SessionId。The name of the cookie that contains the value is ASP.NET_SessionId by default. 可以通过将 SessionState 元素的属性设置为所需的 cookie 名称，来配置不同的 cookie 名称 `cookieName` [ (ASP.NET 设置架构) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/h6bb9cz9(v=vs.100)) 。You can configure a different cookie name by setting the `cookieName` attribute of the [sessionState Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/h6bb9cz9(v=vs.100)) to the desired cookie name. 如果要禁止在 ASP.NET 应用程序中使用 cookie 并仍使用会话状态，则可以将应用程序配置为在 URL 而不是 cookie 中存储会话标识符，方法是 `cookieless` `sessionState` `true` 在应用程序的 Web.config 文件中将元素的属性设置为。If you want to disable the use of cookies in your ASP.NET application and still make use of session state, you can configure your application to store the session identifier in the URL instead of a cookie by setting the `cookieless` attribute of the `sessionState` element to `true` in the Web.config file for your application. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property.

para.span: 您可以通过创建继承类的类 并 使用您自己的自定义实现来重写和方法，来将 ASP.NET 会话标识符替换为您自己的自定义会话标识符。

span.span: You can replace the ASP.NET session identifier with your own custom session identifier by creating a class that inherits the class and overriding the and methods with your own custom implementations.

para.span: 有关替代 类和实现这些方法的示例，请参阅为方法提供的示例 。

span.span: For an example of overriding the class and implementing these methods, see the example provided for the method.

para.span: 您可以 通过创建实现接口的类来将整个与自定义会话 ID 管理器替换 。

span.span: You can replace the entire with a custom session-ID manager by creating a class that implements the interface.

para.span: 如果自定义会话 ID 管理器支持无 cookie 会话标识符，你将需要实现用于在 URL 中发送和检索会话标识符的解决方案，如 ISAPI 筛选器。

span.span: If your custom session-ID manager supports cookieless session identifiers, you will need to implement a solution for sending and retrieving session identifiers in the URL, such as an ISAPI filter.

para.span: 有关创建自定义会话 ID 管理器的详细信息，请参阅 。

span.span: For more information about creating a custom session-ID manager, see .
ASP.NET Session State Overview

related.span: HTTP 处理程序和 HTTP 模块概述

span.span: HTTP Handlers and HTTP Modules Overview

span.span: Creates an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数不应从应用程序代码调用。This constructor is not intended to be called from application code. ASP.NET 调用此构造函数以创建类的实例 。ASP.NET calls this constructor to create an instance of the class. 调用构造函数后，ASP.NET 调用 方法来初始化新的 对象。After calling the constructor, ASP.NET calls the method to initialize the new object.

summary.span: 创建会话的唯一会话标识符。

span.span: Creates a unique session identifier for the session.
A unique session identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不应从应用程序代码调用。This method is not intended to be called from application code. 方法返回唯一会话标识符，该标识符是一个随机生成的数字，该数字编码为24个字符的字符串，其中包含从 a 到 z 的小写字符和从0到5的数字。The method returns a unique session identifier that is a randomly generated number encoded into a 24-character string consisting of lowercase characters from a to z and numbers from 0 to 5. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个类，该类继承 类，并 使用提供并验证作为的方法来重写和方法 。The following code example shows a class that inherits the class and overrides the and methods with methods that supply and validate a as the . [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/CS/GuidSessionIDModule.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/VB/GuidSessionIDModule.vb#7)] 若要使用本示例中演示的自定义类，请将 SessionState 元素的 sessionIDManagerType 属性配置 [ (ASP.NET Settings Schema) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/h6bb9cz9(v=vs.100)) 元素，如下面的示例中所示。To use the custom class demonstrated in this example, configure the sessionIDManagerType attribute of the [sessionState Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/h6bb9cz9(v=vs.100)) element, as shown in the following example. ``` ```

para.span: 可以通过创建继承类的类 并将 和 方法替换为自己的自定义实现，来提供 ASP.NET 会话状态要使用的自定义会话标识符。

span.span: You can supply a custom session identifier to be used by ASP.NET session state by creating a class that inherits the class and overriding the and methods with your own custom implementations.

para.span: 如果自定义会话 ID 不满足方法的默认实现所强制的字符约束 ，则应重写 方法以提供自定义会话标识符的验证。

span.span: If your custom session ID does not meet the character constraints enforced by the default implementation of the method, you should override the method to provide validation of your custom session identifier.

para.span: 在这种情况下， 类将确保自定义会话标识符在 http 响应中进行 url 编码，并分别使用和方法从 http 请求解码 url 。

span.span: In this case, the class will ensure that your custom session identifier is URL encoded in the HTTP response and URL decoded from the HTTP request using the and methods, respectively.
ASP.NET Session State Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不应从应用程序代码调用。This method is not intended to be called from application code. 此方法由类在内部使用， 以对 继承类的类创建的自定义值进行解码 并重写 和 方法。This method is used internally by the class to decode custom values created by classes that inherit the class and override the and methods. 若要确保通过方法从 HTTP 请求中检索到的自定义会话标识符值的保真度 ，请 使用方法对自定义值进行解码 。To ensure the fidelity of a custom session-identifier value retrieved from the HTTP request by the method, the decodes the custom value using the method.

span.span: to indicate the object has done a redirect to determine cookie support; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `cookieless` 元素的属性 `sessionState` 设置为时 `AutoDetect` ， 对象将重定向到同一路径，以确定连接浏览器是否支持 cookie。When the `cookieless` attribute of the `sessionState` element is set to `AutoDetect`, the object will redirect to the same path to determine whether the connecting browser supports cookies. 如果 `suppressAutoDetectRedirect` 参数为 `false` ，则服务器不会执行此重定向。If the `suppressAutoDetectRedirect` parameter is `false`, the server will not perform this redirection. `supportSessionIDReissue` `false` 如果请求使用 cookie 进行会话标识，则将返回参数。The `supportSessionIDReissue` parameter will be returned `false` if the request is using cookies for session identification.

summary.span: 将新创建的会话标识符保存到 HTTP 响应。

span.span: Saves a newly created session identifier to the HTTP response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不应从应用程序代码调用。This method is not intended to be called from application code. 此 方法在 事件期间由对象调用 。The method is called by the object during the event. 当使用无 cookie 会话状态时，该方法会将会话标识符存储在 URL (中) 或在未过期的会话 cookie 中。The method stores the session identifier in either the URL (when cookieless session state is used) or in a non-expiring session cookie. 默认情况下，将 唯一会话标识符放入非过期会话 cookie，并将参数设置 `cookieAdded` 为 `true` 。By default, the places a unique session identifier into a non-expiring session cookie and sets the `cookieAdded` parameter to `true`. 对于无 cookie 会话状态，对象会在 当前 url 中插入唯一会话标识符，将浏览器重定向到包含会话标识符的新 url，然后将 `redirected` 参数设置为 `true` 。For a cookieless session state, the object inserts a unique session identifier into the current URL, redirects the browser to the new URL that includes the session identifier, and then sets the `redirected` parameter to `true`.

span.span: The response has already been sent.
-or-

exception.span: 传递给此方法的会话 ID 验证失败。

span.span: The session ID passed to this method failed validation.
ASP.NET Session State Overview

.property int32 SessionIDMaxLength
Public Shared ReadOnly Property SessionIDMaxLength As Integer
public: static property int SessionIDMaxLength { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取有效会话标识符的最大长度。

span.span: Gets the maximum length of a valid session identifier.

value.span: 有效会话标识符的最大长度。

span.span: The maximum length of a valid session identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 会话标识符的最大长度为80个字符。The maximum length of a session identifier is 80 characters. 尽管方法创建的会话标识符 长度为24个字符，但类允许的会话标识符的最大长度 为80个字符。While session identifiers created by the method are 24 characters long, the maximum length of a session identifier allowed by the class is 80 characters. 如果实现自定义，这一点特别重要 。This is especially important if you implement a custom . 此 方法从当前检索会话标识符值 ，确保值不 会超出该值，并且会话标识符是一个24个字符的字符串，该字符串仅包含小写字符 a 到 z，而数字0到5（通过调用 方法）。The method, which retrieves session-identifier values from the current , ensures that values do not exceed the value and that the session identifier is a 24-character string containing only the lowercase characters a to z and the numbers 0 to 5 by calling the method. 如果实现的自定义 类继承 类并重写 方法，但不重写方法 ，则自定义会话标识符值必须满足上述约束。If you implement a custom class that inherits the class and overrides the method but not the method, your custom session-identifier values must meet the constraints above. 有关替代 类和实现这些方法的示例，请参阅为方法提供的示例 。For an example of overriding the class and implementing these methods, see the example provided for the method.

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不应从应用程序代码调用。This method is not intended to be called from application code. 方法验证所提供的 `id` 是否为24个字符的字符串，该字符串包含从 a 到 z 的小写字符和从0到5的数字，以及会话 ID 的最大长度不超过80个字符。The method verifies that the supplied `id` is a 24-character string consisting of lowercase characters from a to z and numbers from 0 to 5 and that the maximum length of the session ID does not exceed 80 characters. 从 HTTP 请求检索会话标识符时，方法会调用方法，以确保提供的会话标识符的格式正确。The method calls the method when retrieving a session identifier from an HTTP request, to ensure that the supplied session identifier is properly formatted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个类，该类继承 类，并 使用提供并验证作为的方法来重写和方法 。The following code example shows a class that inherits the class and overrides the and methods with methods that supply and validate a as the . [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/CS/GuidSessionIDModule.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/VB/GuidSessionIDModule.vb#7)] 若要使用此示例中演示的自定义类，请将 `SessionID` Web.config 文件中的 HTTP 模块替换为自定义类，如下面的示例中所示。To use the custom class demonstrated in this example, replace the `SessionID` HTTP module in your Web.config file with your custom class, as shown in the following example. ``` ```

para.span: 通过创建继承类的类 ，并 使用自己的自定义实现重写和方法，可以提供要由 ASP.NET 会话状态使用的自定义会话标识符。

span.span: You can supply a custom session identifier to be used by ASP.NET session state by creating a class that inherits the class and overriding the and methods with your own custom implementation.

para.span: 即使在创建自定义会话标识符时，此会话 ID 也会被类限制为80个字符 。

span.span: Even when you create a custom session identifier, the session ID is limited to 80 characters by the class.
ASP.NET Session State Overview
